directions: In a kettle of boiling salted water cook beans until just tender, 3 to 8 minutes. Drain beans in a colander and in a large bowl toss while still hot with oil, zest, nuts, and salt and pepper to taste. Beans may be made 1 day ahead and chilled, covered. Reheat beans, preferably in a microwave.
ingredients: 1 1/2 teaspoons freshly grated lemon zest or to taste
1/3 cup hazelnuts, toasted until golden and chopped fine
title: Green Beans with Hazelnuts and Lemon
